title: Improve Your Self-Talk
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Meg Meeker
itunes:summary: Moms don't always say the nicest things to themselves. John and Danny discuss the importance of speaking positively to change the negative thoughts moms sometimes have about themselves. Receive the book The 10 Habits of Happy Mothers with your gift of any amount!
description: Moms don't always say the nicest things to themselves. John and Danny discuss the importance of speaking positively to change the negative thoughts moms sometimes have about themselves. Receive the book The 10 Habits of Happy Mothers with your gift of any amount!
